Structs/ServerResponse.html#/s:16Securio.name: error
Structs/ServerResponse.html#/s:16Securio.abstract: Was there an error validating the receipt

Structs/ServerResponse.html#/s:16Securio.name: signature
Structs/ServerResponse.html#/s:16Securio.abstract: What is the signature to verify that the receipt was verified

Structs/SecurioResponse.html#/s:16Securi.name: status
Structs/SecurioResponse.html#/s:16Securi.abstract: The status of the receipt validation (either .verified or .error)

Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: appIdentifier
Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Unique identifier used to identify the application being used on Securio

Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: publicKey
Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Public Key is used to verify signed data that comes back from Securio.

Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: sandbox
Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Allows you to force Securio to only validate the receipt against the sandbox server.

Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: init(appIdentifier:publicKey:useSandbox:)
Structs/AppInfo.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Initializes AppInfo with everything you need to begin server-side validation

Structs/AppInfo.html.name: AppInfo
Structs/AppInfo.html.abstract: Structure that encompasses all the information needed to communicate with Securio

Structs/SecurioResponse.html.name: SecurioResponse
Structs/SecurioResponse.html.abstract: What is returned when the framework verifies a receipt with the server

Structs/ServerResponse.html.name: ServerResponse
Structs/ServerResponse.html.abstract: What the server responds to the Securio framework

Enums/SecurioError.html.name: SecurioError
Enums/SecurioError.html.abstract: A list of errors that may be returned when a receipt validation fails

Enums/SecurioStatus.html.name: SecurioStatus
Enums/SecurioStatus.html.abstract: What the status of a response was

Classes/Securio.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: validate(data:with:)
Classes/Securio.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Validate a previously-generated signature to see if it’s valid against data.

Classes/Securio.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.name: validate(receipt:completion:)
Classes/Securio.html#/s:16SecurioFramewo.abstract: Validates a receipt with the Securio server. Does not check for previously verified

Classes/Securio.html.name: Securio
Classes/Securio.html.abstract: Main class for Securio; Instantiate this class to begin verifying receipts
